issue_title: [Bug] Todo.from_dict accepts negative id values without validation

fix_summary.problem: Todo.from_dict accepted negative id values without validation
fix_summary.solution: Added validation in Todo.from_dict to reject negative id values with a clear error message

validation_logic.description: Added validation check: if todo_id < 0: raise ValueError with message about non-negative integer requirement

acceptance_criteria_met: Todo.from_dict accepts id=0 as valid non-negative integer
